Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 16th overall pick, by Pontiac in 1980...
Injured on 6/15/1982 with a Spasms Back, out for 3 weeks...
Earned first career win on 8/9/1983...
Won World Championship with Pontiac in 1983...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 9/1/1986, going 6-0, 1.02...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1987, off Cleveland Benson (TRO)...
Hit first career homerun on 7/7/1987, off Porter Mcculloch (CC)...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Lynchburg on 2/9/1989 to a 6-year deal worth $10,000,000 per year...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 8/1/1989, going 6-0, 1.59...
Injured on 4/26/1990 with a Strained Tricep Muscle, out for 7 weeks...
